member.name: M:Scripting.CSharpScript.FromString(System.String,System.Collections.IList,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Runs an embedded C# script. Your return statement should be left without a semicolon (;) at the end for the script engine to pick up
member.param: The C# script as a string
A list of inputs. You will need to recast each item in the list
An optional list of assembly file paths to be side-loaded with the script
